content: The Web is teeming with information covering every governmental topic, issue, and agency. (As a matter of fact, we recently featured an incredibly useful government resource,

content: .) To find the answer to your question, we searched on the term "

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td small a span
html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td small span
content: " and quickly found the answer at the U.S. Department of Justice web site.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p a b span
html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: section provided all the information we needed. The first thing we spotted was the U.S. Marshals Service mission statement:

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote span
content: The mission of the United States Marshals Service is to protect theFederal courts and ensure the effective operation of the judicial system.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: That statement provided a good start, but we wanted to know more about a U.S. Marshal's day-to-day activities. Fortunately, all we had to do was continue reading.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: The role of the U.S. Marshal is constantly changing depending on the state of the union. In the past, they were responsible for such duties as taking the census and protecting the president. In recent years, the U.S. Marshals have been responsible for "providing protection for the federal judiciary, transporting federal prisoners, protecting endangered federal witnesses and managing assets seized from criminal enterprises." We also learned that U.S. Marshals arrest more federal fugitives than all other federal agencies combined, makingaround 55 percent of all federal arrests.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: In the wake of the recent attacks in New York and Washington, D.C., there has been a great deal of discussion about the implementation of a Federal Air Marshal program. We weren't sure whether the two programs were related, so we searched on the term "

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p a span
html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: " and discovered that they are indeed different governmental programs.

html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p small a span
html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p small span
